name: Africa by Jess Guzman Yoga mat - Art Collection - 4mm
description:
CONOCE A LA ARTISTA
JESS GUZMAN, Colombiana, Arquitecta de profesión y artista de vocación. Me encuentro muy inclinado hacia la pintura; dibuja y pinta desde niña porque eso la hace sentir libre. Encuentra en lápiz y papel la manera de materializar sus pensamientos y emociones.
Suele inspirarse en las formas de la naturaleza, y su estilo es una mezcla entre boceto, caricatura y abstracción.
La idea de dibujar para House of Mats la entusiasmó. Le encanta el concepto que Lucía, la dueña, tiene de la marca, pero más que eso, la historia que hay detrás y las razones que la motivaron.
Las ilustraciones de House surgen del concepto mismo de la marca: los colores, las posturas, la conexión con la naturaleza, la energía del sol y del universo, dando como resultado una serie de imágenes sencillas, realizadas a mano con un trazo suave, la que comunican los conceptos básicos del yoga.
Nada es absoluto, todo es complementario, y de ese tránsito surge la idea.
Sobre el diseño: El elefante en general es un animal que se asemeja a los humanos, es sociable y disfruta de la unión familiar. Además, los elefantes crean fuertes lazos con su familia y amigos, hasta el punto de poder identificarse después de un tiempo sin verse.

name: Airy Blue Yoga mat - Laboratory Limited Edition - 3.5mm
description:
Airy Blue is like a breath of fresh air, light and freeing. It’s the color of open skies and boundless horizons, inviting you to expand your mind and let your spirit soar. This mat is for those who seek clarity and peace, offering a space where you can let go of stress and embrace the lightness of being.
-
"Mat laboratory" , a collection created from experimentation with colors and textures that awaken the senses thanks to their originality and detail. Each model stands out for its unique and modern design, representing a disruptive way of distinguishing our brand.
At the Laboratory we are dedicated to the study of sensations through constant innovation in materials and colors, with a meticulous focus on quality and sustainability. Our mats are produced in a thickness of 3.5mm, achieving the perfect weight so you can easily transport them wherever you want.
What distinguishes it?
Unique and original design: Each mat features a carefully selected combination of colors and textures.
Constant innovation: Materials and colors developed through detailed studies.
Quality and sustainability: Committed to high quality and environmentally friendly products.
Portability: 3.5mm thickness for adequate weight and easy transportation.
Our differential?
Modern and disruptive style, Ideal for those looking to stand out.
Enhanced sensations, designed to enhance your senses.
Easy to carry, perfect for moving anywhere effortlessly.

name: Clay Yoga mat - Laboratory Limited Edition - 3.5mm
description:
Clay is the color of the sand, raw and elemental. It’s a reminder of our connection to the natural world and the grounding force it provides. This mat is for those who value authenticity and simplicity, offering a space where you can return to your roots and find balance amidst the chaos of life.
-
"Laboratorio de Mats" , a collection created from experimentation with colors and textures that awaken the senses thanks to their originality and detail. Each model stands out for its unique and modern design, representing a disruptive way of distinguishing our brand.

name: Daylight moth Yoga mat by Ula Basinska - Art Collection - 4mm
description:
CONOCE AL ARTISTA
Ula Basinska. Pintora desde que tiene memoria. Nacida en Polonia, viviendo en la Patagonia Argentina, ella vibra el sentimiento de ser parte de la naturaleza y la majestuosa calma del sur y sus lagos.
Sus pinturas reflejan los milagros de la tierra que la rodea. Ella trabaja con acuarelas porque la encuentra viva, impredecible y al mismo tiempo ligera y sutil.
Para este diseño, Ula combinó su arte manual con la edición digital creando negativos que parecen versiones nocturnas de imágenes pintadas durante el día.
Sentirás las luces y las sombras durante tu práctica. Dualismo y unión.

name: Forest Green Yoga mat - Studio Collection - 4.5mm
description:
Forest Green is a journey into the heart of nature. This mat brings to mind the serenity of ancient woodlands, where the air is thick with the scent of pine and the ground is soft underfoot. It connects you to the earth, grounding your practice in the vibrant energy of life. With each movement, you feel the strength and renewal that comes from nature’s embrace.
-
The Studio 4.5mm Collection is a permanent and timeless line developed with materials of Japanese origin and manufactured with standards and materials of ethical origin.
This collection stands out for its advanced "Ultimate grip" technology, offering the best grip and performance between postures that the market offers today.
Designed to protect your joints and provide safe practice, this collection uses our innovative "silk touch" technology for softer skin contact.
With a thickness of 4.5mm, our mats guarantee the perfect balance between comfort and support.
What distinguishes it?
Materials of Japanese origin: High quality and durability.
Ethical manufacturing: Committed to sustainable and responsible practices.
Advanced grip technology: Delivers the best performance on the market.
"silk touch" technology: Soft in contact with the skin.
Our differential?
Superior joint protection: 4.5mm thickness reduces pressure on joints.
Comfort and softness: Ideal for a comfortable practice experience.
Versatility of use: Perfect for studios, hotels, retreat centers and for daily use.
Timeless Style: Brings a touch of elegance and sophistication to any practice environment.

description:

This mat is for those who value clarity and simplicity, providing a serene foundation for your practice wherever you go.
-
"Travel" collection, designed especially for those who take their yoga practice everywhere. Lightweight, foldable mats in neutral colors that are perfect to accompany you on your trips, from weekend getaways to adventures around the world.
What distinguishes us?
Lightweight and Foldable: Easy to transport and store, ideal for traveling.
Neutral Colors: Elegant and versatile, they combine with any style.
Compact Design: Folds efficiently for hassle-free transportation.
Our differential?
Extreme Portability: Take your mat to any destination with ease.
Practical and Functional: Perfect for keeping your yoga routine moving.
Discreet Style: Neutral colors that adapt to any environment.

name: Moonlight shadow - Art Collection - 4mm
description:
Art Collection: An exclusive fusion of creativity and functionality. In this unique series, artists, illustrators, and designers have contributed their original works to transform each yoga mat into a one-of-a-kind piece of art.
Each design is a special collaboration reflecting the artist's vision and style, offering a limited series to ensure the originality and exclusivity of each piece. The collection celebrates diversity and talent, bringing the beauty of art to your daily practice.
 
What makes us different?
Original Works: Unique designs created by renowned artists and illustrators.
Limited Editions: Each mat is an exclusive piece, available in limited quantities.
Fusion of Art and Functionality: Aesthetically inspiring designs that do not compromise on quality and comfort.
 
Our Unique Selling Points?
Personal Expression: Add an artistic and personal touch to your practice space.
Guaranteed Exclusivity: Enjoy a unique piece that few will own.
Daily Inspiration: Let creativity and art enrich your yoga routine.

name: The Black Mat - Colección de viaje. Plegable 2mm
description:
The Black Mat representa las profundidades misteriosas e infinitas del universo. Es el color de la noche, un tiempo de introspección y un lienzo para la imaginación. Una invitación a viajar hacia el interior, abrazando lo desconocido y encontrando fuerza en un mundo interior. Compañero silencioso, que te ancla con su profunda estabilidad y presencia inquebrantable.
-
Colección "Traveler", diseñada especialmente para quienes llevan su práctica de yoga a todas partes. Mats livianos y plegables en colores neutros que son perfectos para acompañarte en tus viajes, desde escapadas de fin de semana hasta aventuras alrededor del mundo.
Qué nos distingue?
Livianos y Plegables: Fácil de transportar y almacenar, ideal para viajar.
Colores Neutros: Elegantes y versátiles, combinan con cualquier estilo.
Diseño Compacto: Se pliega de manera eficiente para un transporte sin complicaciones.
Nuestro diferencial?
Portabilidad Extrema: Lleva tu mat a cualquier destino con facilidad.
Práctico y Funcional: Perfecto para mantener tu rutina de yoga en movimiento.
Estilo Discreto: Colores neutros que se adaptan a cualquier entorno.
